ygData.subject: Re: Neriak Faction
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I believe (but am not certain) sure the red wine quest works even if you re dubious.  If not, you might be able to get a druid to camo you both, get to 3rd
ygData.messageBody:
On Sun, 20 Feb 2000, Lomack wrote:

> I am currently trying to raise my Dark Barginers Faction. Thats basically
> Neriak Merchant faction. Its an easy thing to do if your a Dark elf, as
> you can do some of the quests.

I believe (but am not certain) sure the red wine quest works even if
you're dubious. If not, you might be able to get a druid to camo you
both, get to 3rd gate and group wolf form - that makes you indifferent to
most factions, but don't know about dark bargainers specifically.

> Unfortunately I am a gnome (it has its advantages (non kos in North
> Freeport)). However I don't currently have enough Dark Barginers
> faction to do quests with them. I can still buy bank and sell in
> Neriak but I am trying to get some better pricing.

Really? Did you kill crushbone orcs or something?

Gnip (L18 Gnome Necro, Bertoxx follower) was indifferent to the merchants
at level 4. At level 9, I could afford a packfull of red wine for the guy
in the 3rd gate library, and am now warmly viewed by most merchants.

Lightstones and greater lightstones to the DE smith in S Ro helps this
faction as well.

> Does anyone know of any Mobs that will provide a positive bonus to Dark
> Barginers faction?

Heh. The only one I know of are the slaves in crushbone.
--
Mark Rafn dagon@... <http://www.dagon.net/> !G
